VIII.iv.1.B.2.e
.
Required Information in MST Claims Development Letters
When writing a letter to obtain information from the Veteran regarding a claim based on MST, ensure the development letter includes the
MST – Important Information
VBMS development paragraph.
Note
:  The
MST – Important Information
paragraph informs Veterans of different sources of support they may access during or after the claims process, including the availability of free treatment for mental and physical health conditions related to experiences of MST.
Important
:  Letters and VBMS development paragraphs used to solicit details concerning a combat-related stressful event are inappropriate for claims based on personal trauma.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) or Other Claims Related to Personal Trauma
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
